title: The Client Update Alpha Ending Soon

replies.body: I'm one of those few people who really like the item set feature :/. I only use it for my main champions but it speeds up the process a lot for me. The item shop itself is quite cluttered and the recommended items outdated imo (in a lot of, not all cases), will there be any replacement feature similar to this?
i agree. I really hope riot will end up adding the feature one day, i believe it's really handy and just needs a few tweaks so it easier to use and a lot more people would use it i believe

I used the new client for one game and to put it simply it was alright. It looks more better(in some parts, in my opinion the old client had some better looking features) but I don't know if it was just me but everything before the loading screen and the game was really laggy. The new client ran around 20-30 fps and it dropped to 5-10 when I did something (e.g tried to select role champion, try to see someone's profile) for me.
Hopefully that's something that will be improved soon, or at least before it's out of beta.
Agreed, I've had the same problem and I know its not my system specs because I have a fairly decent gaming computer :(

Until they support lower end machines better on the beta, I wont be using it when i can avoid it. Takes MUCH longer for me currently then it should to load anything and isn't the best to look at because it lags. But other than that, I love it.
Thankfully, riot knows and is working on it so I'm sure it wont be long before its fully working as intended!
Is my game going to tear itself apart seeing I have both clients running side-by-side?
You can't run both clients side by side, the one opened second won't start up at all.
Nah just having both installed, not literally running at the same time.

Ill be honest i have the Alpha client and i will honestly say it looks great its new and looks modern etc .... but .... there is too many buttons i believe less is more the current interface at the moment is perfect just needs some slight tweaks etc.
#OHMYKAPPACHINO
I think people who tried the alpha client test should get a reward just like the people who got King Rammus for trying the the beta test
Personally i don't think they will. Unlike PBE accounts alpha client accounts are actually quite common so there would be a ton of people to gift which would take a ton of time and reasources.

I do really like the alpha client with all its new and shiny things, but I have to agree what some other people have said; there's too much information on one page. Keeping this segmented in to boxes like the legacy client keeps the information from overlapping and competing for attention.
And I don't understand why you couldn't keep the game selecting type simple as it is in the legacy client.
Furthermore the chat "box" thing is incredibly frustrating to use when trying to have multiple chats as it is laggy (probably will be fixed with beta) and ,imo, TOO compact.
Other than perhaps overthinking information display and a couple of bugs, its all looking and functioning very nicely ;) {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
